directions: Place frozen berries, almond milk, banana, and acai pulp in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into 2 bowls and top with granola, mango, strawberries, and kiwi slices. Drizzle with agave syrup.
ingredients: 4 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp (such as Sambazon®)
title: Acai Rainbow Smoothie Bowl for 2
